description: Mealdotmatch was the final project that my team and I built during bootcamp. This application was build to help people save food while we practice technologies that we learned in class.
myContributions: We all took turns working on the entire stack.
stack: JS, GraphQL, Twillio, Express, React, React-Bootstrap, Heroku

description: WonderstruckTV is a project built for BBC America. This is a platform that shows shortform videos of animals, nature, and other natural phenomenon. Studies have shown that watching nature content improves our emotional wellbeing.
myContributions: I coded the functionality and designs for the frontend of this application. I also made part of this application content manageable for editors.

description: BroadenMEdia is an application that calculates the political percentage of someone based on the media that they consume.
myContributions: I coded the design of the website using SASS.
